metadata.title: CVE-2017-16926 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Ohcount 3.0.0 is prone to a command injection via specially crafted filenames containing shell metacharacters, which can be exploited by an attacker (providing a source tree for Ohcount processing) to execute arbitrary code as the user running Ohcount.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-16926` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ohcount - 3.1.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ohcount package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.0-2').
